relics.name: Doran's Blade
relics.description: For the first 3 turns of combat gain 3 Vigor.

relics.name: Doran's Shield
relics.description: For the first 3 turns of combat gain 3 Block.

relics.name: Electrocute
relics.description: Once per turn, if you play 3 attacks, Deal 8 damage to an enemy.

relics.name: Dark Harvest
relics.description: Killing an Elite or Boss grants 1 stack of Dark Harvest. During Boss and Elite combats, gain Vigor equal to your Dark Harvest stacks at the start of each turn.

relics.name: First Strike
relics.description: Each combat, gain gold equal to 20% of damage dealt with your first 3 attacks.

relics.name: Hubris
relics.description:
When an enemy dies, gain 5 Strength.
At the end of this turn, lose 5 Strength

relics.name: Spear Of Shojin
relics.description: Every 5 cards played, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1.

relics.name: Aftershock
relics.description: At the start of your 4th turn, gain 10 Block and deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Death's Dance
relics.description:
Reduce damage taken by 33% and instead store it within this relic.
At the end of every turn take 25% of the damage stored.
Exiting a fight in any way removes all damage stored.

relics.name: Eclipse
relics.description: Once per combat, when you play 5 attacks in a single turn, gain 14 Temporary HP.

relics.name: Base Form
relics.description:
Gain 3 Temporary HP at combat start.
For the first 2 turns of combat draw 1 additional card.

relics.name: Rhaast Form
relics.description: Each time you damage an enemy with an attack (or Reap), gain 10% ( 8%) of damage dealt as Temp HP.

relics.name: Shadow Assassin Form
relics.description: For every 25 unblocked damage dealt, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: The Darkin is gone. Our enemies are next.

relics.name: The Darkin Scythe
relics.description:
Gather Red or Blue essence from combat encounters (Elites count as 2). Upon gathering 8 Essence of either type, Kayn can assume the form of Darkin Slayer or Shadow Assassin.
Darkin Slayer: Gain 10% of damage dealt as Temp HP.
Shadow Assassin: Draw a card for every 25 damage you deal.

relics.name: InfinityEdge
relics.description: When attacking an enemy with Vulnerable, gain 1 Temporary Strength.

relics.name: Manamune
relics.description: Once per turn, When you play 3 attacks, gain [E] .

relics.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
relics.description: Start each Elite and Boss combat with 1 Strength. If you win without taking damage, permanently increase this by 1 (up to 10)

relics.name: Predator
relics.description: Each combat, the first time you play a card that costs 2 or more, draw 1 card.

relics.name: The Collector
relics.description:
You execute enemies below 5% health.
When you kill an enemy gain 5 gold.

keywords.name: Form Bonus
keywords.description: The below effect changes based on Kayn's current Form.

keywords.name: Reap
keywords.description: When you end your turn with unused [E], enemies with Reap lose HP.

keywords.name: Reaper's Touch
keywords.description: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to their current Reap.
